links.title: Report: Apple Inc. (AAPL) to Drop Intel as Radio Chip Supplier
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has reportedly notified Intel that it will no longer be using its radio chips for its iPhones. The changes will impact with future models, but the decision is already said to be having a ripple effect for Intel. 9to5 Mac has the scoop on Apple's decision and how it impacts Intel.

messages.body: $AAPL Mexico increased its tariffs on U.S. pork to 20 percent. Mexico bought almost 25 percent of all U.S. pork shipments last year.
